name: Golden Path
description:
A small action puzzle game created in Unity for the GameDev.tv Game Jam in 2021.

Goal
Finish as many levels as you can within the given time without any mistakes.
You can only see the real path if you use your sense view which of course has a cooldown :D


Game Controls
Movement - Arrow keys or WASD
Enable Sense View - Space
Pause Game - ESC

Source Code
https://github.com/cut-it-out/GoldenPath
